panel__settings__quick_menu__name_subhea.message: Change the name of the quick menu.

panel__settings__quick_menu__type_subhea.message:
Change the scope of the dropdown menu. 
(Synology task or local download).

panel__settings__quick_menu__max_subhead.message: Set the maximum number of destination to show in dropdown (defaults to 5).

panel__settings__quick_menu__modal_subhe.message: Toggle to open full modal instead of shortcut.

panel__settings__quick_menu__popup_subhe.message: Toggle to open in popup instead of shortcut.
